name: Witching Hour at Hell House
description:
You wake up disoriented inside a strange room.  The feeling of evil bears down on you and it becomes apparent that you must escape your confinement before something awful happens.

Witching Hour at Hell House is inspired by late 70s-early 80s horror movies and NES games.  

BEST PLAYED IN THE DARK WITH HEADPHONES!

Controls:

Move - Arrow keys

Pickup Items/Search - Space

Drop Current Item - Shift

Note: can only search when you are currently not holding anything.

Search cabinets, drawers, and more for tools to escape while fending off the various horrors that dwell inside the house and maybe even uncover the tragic events that has befallen the previous residents.  Many horrors and spine-tingling chills await you in...  Witching Hour at Hell House!
